Who is the HOD of ECE?.answer: Dr.R.Poornachandran,M.E,Phd., is the Head of the Department for 1st & 2nd year, and Dr.Mr.Anand Kumar,M.E,Phd.,  is the Head of the Department for 3rd & Final year ECE at our college.

What labs are available in ECE?.answer: The ECE department includes labs like VLSI Lab, DSP Lab, Communication Lab, and Embedded Systems Lab.

Who teaches Embedded Systems?.answer: Mr. Karthik handles the Embedded Systems subject in ECE.
